messages.text: Hi, I was charged twice for my auto policy this month.
I'm sorry to hear that! Let me check your account.
Yes, I see the duplicate charge. It looks like there was a system error.
Can I get a refund then?
Absolutely. I've initiated a refund of $128. It should be back in your account within 3–5 business days.
Thank you. Please make sure it doesn’t happen again.
I’ve flagged your account to prevent this from recurring. Have a great day!
